name: Clawitzer
author: otumami
flavor_text: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

attacks.name: Standing By
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Sharpshooting attack does 120 damage instead of 40.

attacks.name: Sharpshooting
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
